seoDescription: SalesBlaster AI is an all in on marketing automation platform that uses AI agents to call, text, and nurture leads, handle inbound calls, and book sales calls directly within your CRM.

subheading.main: Automated SMS outbound campaigns, 24/7 lead nurturing, and database reactivation

header.title: Automate Your Sales Channels
header.subtitle: We set up an entire AI marketing automation system for your business. Then it's yours, forever.

mainFeatures.title: 80% Less Time Booking Sales Calls
mainFeatures.description: AI Agents call, text, and nurture hot leads, handle inbound calls, and book sales calls - directly within your CRM.

mainFeatures.title: 4x More Deals Closed
mainFeatures.description: Do 10x the volume of your competitors, combined.

mainFeatures.title: GPT-Personalized Calls
mainFeatures.description: Agents remember each prospect's personal details and past interactions.

leadSources.title: Leads From Any Source
leadSources.description: Drip in your leads one at a time, or blast them all at once.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Monitor campaigns in real-time with our custom client portal.

header.title: 3 Step Process
header.description: We'll build out your company's AI system in 2 weeks and continually optimize it until it converts profitably.
header.additionalInfo: Once it's optimized, you can choose to either maintain it yourself or let us scale it for you on a month-to-month basis.

steps.title: CONNECT LEADS
steps.description: Upload a CSV or connect your inbound lead sources.
steps.note: If you don't have any, don't worry - we can help with that.

features.title: Inbound Leads
features.description: Connect forms, paid ads, and organic traffic directly with your CRM.

features.title: Upload CSV's
features.description: Start a new outbound campaign or reactivate all your old database leads.

features.title: Assign Live Transfers
features.description: Let your team pick up where we left off with dynamic call routing.

steps.title: CHOOSE AGENT
steps.description: Our AI Agents convert. For dirt cheap.
steps.subtitle: We rigorously test and improve your agents until it's a no-brainer profitable investment for your business.

features.title: Agents for Every Business Function
features.description: Agents communicate with each other and route each call to the most relevant person or action.

features.title: Perform Actions Automatically
features.description: Our agents can perform actions across 8,000+ apps and easily integrate into your existing tools.

steps.title: START CAMPAIGN
steps.description: Monitor real-time performance metrics and call recordings.
steps.subtitle: Easily edit campaigns and test different voices, scripts, and prompts.

features.title: Global Edge Network
features.description: Deliver calls with minimal latency to your leads using their own local area code.

features.title: Scheduled Campaigns
features.description: Make calls only on specific days and times.

features.title: Data Protection
features.description: All data is encrypted on our cloud, or stored securly on your own servers.

notifications.title: Real-Time Notifications
notifications.description: Get instant notifications for when you need a human-in-the-loop.

header.title: Used by Entreprenurs
header.subtitle: SalesBlaster AI is designed perfectly for small-to-medium sized businesses.

featuredTestimonials.name: Danny Engels
featuredTestimonials.quote: SalesBlaster transformed our business. We were spending hours manually sourcing and qualifying leads. SalesBlaster has increased our number of leads so significantly that we are thinking about additional offerings to use it for. 10/10 would recommend to any business!

featuredTestimonials.name: Trent Ballard
featuredTestimonials.quote: With SalesBlaster we were able to double our call volume for a fraction of the cost. This has lead to an increase in leads, client growth and bigger margins. Voice AI is no longer the future, it is now... and only those that take advantage of it will see the benefits.

featuredTestimonials.name: Patrick Aloisio
featuredTestimonials.quote: We white-labeled SalesBlaster for our marketing agency which allowed us to offer an entirely new marketing channel to all of our existing clients. Their team was super helpful and guided us along each step of the way. By far the best decision we've ever made for our business.

cta.title: Get started today with SalesBlaster AI to kickstart your marketing efforts
cta.description: SalesBlaster AI is on a mission to make Voice AI more accessible to everyone. Talk to our team today to see if it's the right fit for you.

subtitle.description: Contact us and let us know how we can help you.

faqs.title: How does SalesBlaster AI work?
faqs.description: SalesBlaster AI uses advanced AI agents to automate your sales channels. These agents can call, text, and nurture leads, handle inbound calls, and book sales calls directly within your CRM.

faqs.title: Is this a SaaS or a done-for-you Marketing Service?
faqs.description: We are a done-for-you marketing service. We've built our own proprietary marketing automation platform which you'll also have access to as one of our clients.

faqs.title: What's the minimum contract term?
faqs.description: There's no minimum contract term, you can cancel anytime. Once we setup your automation system, you can choose to have us monitor your campaigns for you on a monthly basis or you can take over and manage them yourself.

faqs.title: What kind of businesses can benefit from SalesBlaster AI?
faqs.description: SalesBlaster AI is designed for entrepreneurs, business owners, and marketing agencies looking to automate and scale their sales processes.

faqs.title: Can I integrate SalesBlaster AI with my existing tools?
faqs.description: Yes, SalesBlaster AI integrates with over 8,000 apps, allowing our AI agents to perform actions across your existing tools and CRM systems.

faqs.title: Does SalesBlaster AI provide analytics?
faqs.description: Absolutely. SalesBlaster AI offers advanced analytics through a custom client portal, allowing you to monitor your campaigns in real-time.

faqs.title: How long does it take to set up SalesBlaster AI?
faqs.description: We typically build out your AI automation system in about 2 weeks. After that, you get continued access to our proprietary software, free of charge.

faqs.title: Can I use my own voice for the AI agents?
faqs.description: Yes, we can clone your voice for use with our AI agents, providing a personalized touch to your automated calls.

faqs.title: How does SalesBlaster AI handle lead sources?
faqs.description: SalesBlaster AI can connect with various lead sources, including CSV uploads, lead forms, and database reactivation. You can drip in leads one at a time or process them all at once.

faqs.title: Is there a trial available for SalesBlaster AI?
faqs.description: We offer personalized demos to showcase how SalesBlaster AI can benefit your specific business. You can book a demo through our website.

faqs.title: How secure is the data handled by SalesBlaster AI?
faqs.description: We take data protection seriously. All data is encrypted and can be stored either on our secure cloud or on your own systems, depending on your preference.
